name: Motel Hario
description:
Descent is Death

Descenders seek to halt your ascendance, avoid them as you drain the energies of the divine portals. You may not have a light, but you are destined to join the noumenal world. 

A new world depends on the destruction of the old, thus opening a door demands closing another.

Controls

ESCAPE - Quit (no menu, sorry!)

A - Left
D - Right
W - Enter Portal
S - Exit Portal
HOLD SPACEBAR - Drain Portal

Features
  • Descending "metaphysical action" platformer for Windows and Linux
  • Hold spacebar to drain portals (must remain within range)
  • Teleportation Up and Down (portals marked by chevrons)
  • Hide from Descenders in portals
  • Death Masks for Descenders and Players
  • Vexing music and art by yours truly

This is a student project for infsci1061
